pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predictive Inference on Totals and Averages of Finite Populations Segmented in Planned and Unplanned Domains. // This package computes Bayesian predictive inference on totals and averages of finite populations segmented in planned and unplanned domains. Inference is based on Bayesian nonparametric methods using species-sampling models (specifically the Dirichlet process).
